personalInfo.name: Gonzalo Ronz√≥n
personalInfo.title: Information Technology and Intelligent Systems Engineer

summary: Enthusiastic and adaptable Information Technology and Intelligent Systems Engineer with 5 years of experience in software engineering and project management, specializing in front-end development with React and back-end integration using Django.

Proficient in agile methodologies, network updates, and software development lifecycles, with a record of delivering efficient platforms and fostering collaborative environments. Highly committed and responsible, I thrive on continuous learning and pragmatic solutions.

Leveraging my skills as a Full Stack Engineer, I aspire to design, implement, and maintain cutting-edge web applications that help organizations achieve their goals. I succeed in dynamic environments where innovation and teamwork are key.

details: Design and implement network updates, researching technological solutions and best practices (including real-time SRT stream monitoring).
Manage technical budgets and coordinate with vendors, creating a hub for controlling all IP devices for broadcast networks.
Develop infrastructure solutions, resolving operational issues and enhancing team collaboration.
Maintain strong internal/external relationships and produce comprehensive user manuals.
Led seamless React application integrations with extensive unit and integration testing.
Resolved software issues and developed intuitive user interfaces (UI) using Adobe XD.
Adopted agile practices and DevOps for Django-based backends, promoting effective cross-team collaboration.
Created detailed and precise rack plans with Visio, translating documents from English to Spanish.
Maintained broadcast equipment for optimal performance and supported broadcast productions.
Advanced a data management app and built a Power BI dashboard to monitor team performance.
Maintained a webpage using Angular for optimal performance and user experience.
Produced multimedia products via Adobe Creative Suite for educational projects.
Showcased leadership in digital design for online courses and project management.

projects.name: No Dedicated Projects Listed

education.details: Concentrated on systems design, network architectures, and intelligent solutions.

about.description: I'm a passionate Information Technology and Intelligent Systems Engineer based in CDMX, Mexico. Beyond the code and technical specifications, I'm an innovative thinker who thrives on solving complex problems and creating efficient solutions.
about.approach: I believe in the power of continuous learning and staying ahead of technological trends. My adaptable nature and strong communication skills allow me to work effectively in diverse teams and bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
about.interests: When I'm not coding or exploring new technologies, I enjoy contributing to the tech community, mentoring aspiring developers, and staying active through sports and outdoor activities. I'm also passionate about sustainable technology and its impact on our future.
